Title: Catch-22
Overview: A bombardier in World War II tries desperately to escape the insanity of the war. However, sometimes insanity is the only sane way to cope with a crazy situation. Catch-22 is a parody of a "military mentality" and of a bureaucratic society in general.

Title: The Man Who Left His Will on Film
Overview: A metaphysical mystery involving a university student's camera getting stolen, and the thief then committing suicide. Looking back upon the event, the situation comes to be questioned if it happened at all.

Title: Ned Kelly
Overview: Unable to support his family in the Australian outback, a man turns to stealing horses in order to make money. He gets more deeply drawn into the outlaw life, and eventually becomes involved in murders. Based on the life of famed 19th-century Australian outlaw Ned Kelly.

Title: Angels Die Hard
Tagline: THEIR BATTLE CRY-- "KILL THE PIGS!"
Overview: Gang of bikers try to save people in a mining disaster.

Title: A Bullet for Pretty Boy
Tagline: Defacing public property is against the law... but so is bank robbing, murder and the kind of women Charlie Floyd loved.
Overview: A biography of Charles "Pretty Boy" Floyd, a gangster who started his career at a young age after seeking revenge for his father's murder.

Title: Chisum
Tagline: THE LEGEND - John Wayne is 'Chisum'
Overview: Cattle baron John Chisum joins forces with Billy the Kid and Pat Garrett to fight the Lincoln County land war.

Title: Fruit of Paradise
Overview: The story is an allegory of Adam and Eve, in a modern (made in the '60s) Health Retreat. The action involves our hero wandering the grounds where she becomes obsessed with a mysterious man in red, who may or may not be a killer.

Title: Space Amoeba
Tagline: Hideous creatures from outer space advance to invade the earth!
Overview: When a space probe crash-lands on a far-flung Pacific atoll, the craft's alien stowaways decide to take over their new world one creature at a time. Soon, the parasitic life forms latch onto three indigenous critters -- a squid, a crab and a snapping turtle -- and transform them into colossal mutant monsters.
Original Title: Gezora, Ganime, Kameba: Kessen! Nankai no daikaijû

Title: May Morning
Overview: In a changing world a young Italian enrols at Oxford and finds i is him they are out to change.

Title: Goodbye Gemini
Tagline: In the age of Aquarius the twins Julian & Jackie share everything - Love, men and murder
Overview: Unnaturally close, jet-setting twins become enmeshed in the Swinging London scene, where their relationship is strained after they befriend a predatory hustler and his girlfriend.

Title: The Key to Paradise
Overview: The Key to Paradise

Title: Eldridge Cleaver, Black Panther
Overview: The portrait of Eldridge Cleaver, the "Minister of Information" for the Black Panthers movement, in exile in Algiers.

Title: The Breach
Overview: An innocent woman falls prey to the machinations of her abusive husband, his wealthy father, and a shady family friend.

Title: Red Sun
Overview: Thomas hitchhikes from Hamburg to Munich where he meets his ex-girlfriend, Peggy. As Thomas doesn't have a bed for the night Peggy takes him home, not knowing that she and her four room mates have all made a strange pact....

Title: Wanda
Overview: Wanda, after a string of abusive relationships, abandons her family and seeks solace in the company of a petty criminal (Michael Higgins).

Title: Deep End
Tagline: If you can't have the real thing... you do all kinds of unreal things.
Overview: 15-year-old Mike takes a job at the local swimming baths, where he becomes obsessed with an attractive young woman, Susan, who works there as an attendant. Although Susan has a fiancé, Mike does his best to sabotage the relationship, to the extent of stalking both her and her fiancé.

Title: Which Way to the Front?
Overview: Brendan Byers III (Jerry Lewis), one of the richest men in America, has been pronounced 4-F and can't serve his country in it's war against Hitler. Byers does not takes "No" for an answer and recruits other 4-F's to fight against Hitler.

Title: Cromwell
Overview: Disgusted with the policies of King Charles I, Oliver Cromwell plans to take his family to the New World. But on the eve of their departure, Cromwell is drawn into the tangled web of religion and politics that will result in the English Civil War.

Title: Violent City
Overview: A hitman is double-crossed by his girlfriend and barely escapes a murder attempt. He then sets out to take his revenge on the woman and the gang boss who put her up to it.

Title: Come Have Coffee with Us
Overview: Paronzini at the age of 50, decides to get married and he looks at the Tettamanzi's three sisters.
Original Title: Venga a prendere il caffè da noi

Title: Pieces of Dreams
Overview: A young priest (Robert Forster) questions his faith after he falls in love with a social worker.

Title: Equinox
Tagline: It was a peaceful mountain retreat until IT came home...
Overview: Four friends are attacked by a demon while on a picnic, due to possession of a tome of mystic information. Told in flashbacks by the sole survivor.

Title: The Great White Hope
Tagline: The most honored play in the history of Broadway...becomes an electrifying motion picture!
Overview: A black champion boxer and his white female companion struggle to survive while the white boxing establishment looks for ways to knock him down

Title: The Debut
Overview: A film-in-film story set in a provincial town in Russia. Pasha is an amateur actress who plays a witch at a local club, but her dream is to play Joan of Arc. In a strike of luck she is cast as Joan of Arc in a big screen film. Now she is torn between her luck and her love to Arkadi (Kuravlev) who is a married man.

Title: Trog
Tagline: From a million years back...Horror explodes into today!
Overview:
A sympathetic anthropologist uses drugs and surgery to try to communicate with a primitive troglodyte who is found living in a local cave.
 Anthropologist Dr. Brockton (Joan Crawford) unearths a troglodyte (an Ice Age ‘missing link” half-caveman, half-ape) and manages to domesticate him – until he’s let loose by an irate land developer, and goes on a rampage, terrorizing the local citizenry.

Title: When Dinosaurs Ruled the Earth
Tagline: Enter an age of unknown terrors, pagan worship and virgin sacrifice...
Overview: Hammer Film’s follow-up to the successful One Million Years B.C. is set in an ancient past when humans and dinosaurs co-exist.  Athletic cavewomen and hairy men wander around, grunting, sweating and occasionally sacrificing evil blonde babes to the sun in return for protection from stop-motion beasts. The fun-loving, energetic Sanna (Victoria Vetri), one of the sacrificial offerings, manages to escape during a ritual and joins another tribe where she says ‘necro’ a lot and falls in love with a surprisingly hairless guy.

Title: The Twelve Chairs
Tagline: A wild and hilarious chase for a fortune in jewels.
Overview: A treasure hunt. An aging ex-nobleman of the Czarist regime has finally adjusted to life under the commisars in Russia. Both he and the local priest find that the family jewels were hidden in a chair, one of a set of twelve. They return separately to Moscow to find the hidden fortune.

Title: The McKenzie Break
Overview: A German U-Boat commander and 600 prisoners plan a daring escape from a PoW camp in Scotland.

Title: The Christine Jorgensen Story
Overview: I couldn't live in a man's body!

Title: The Horror of Frankenstein
Overview: Victor Frankenstein, descendant of the infamous scientist, Baron Von Frankenstein, follows in his experimental footsteps. Initially his success involves the resuscitation of a tortoise and progressing onto more ambitious projects, including creating his own monster. The gothic genre is re-worked to create a drama of black humour and farce.

Title: Perfect Friday
Overview: The deputy manager of a London bank has worked out a way to rob the branch of £200,000. When he becomes involved with the attractive Lady Dorset he decides to go ahead with his plan. He needs her help and that of her philandering spendthrift husband. It all comes down to a matter of trust.

Title: Where’s Poppa?
Tagline: I wish momma would stop saying that! Yeah.
Overview: When New York attorney Gordon Hocheiser meets Louise Callan, the girl of his dreams, he schemes to eliminate his aging, senile mother, even though he promised his late father that he'd always take care of her. He fears that his batty mom's eccentricities will shortly lead to Louise's departure.

Title: The Rise and Rise of Michael Rimmer
Overview: Fresh-faced young Michael Rimmer worms his way into an opinion poll company and is soon running the place. He uses this as a springboard to get into politics and in the mini-skirted flared-trousered world of 1970 Britain starts to rise through the Tory ranks.
Original Title: The Rise and Rise of Michael Rimmer

Title: Pippi on the Run
Overview: Fed up with their strict parents, Tommy and Annika run away from home, with their friend Pippi Longstocking to look after them in their long trek.

Title: Flap
Tagline: A warning to the Mayor: FLAP is here! The Indians have already claimed Alcatraz. City Hall may be next. You have been warned.
Overview: Comedy based on the plight of modern Native Americans living on reservations.

Title: Narrien Illat
Overview: The ups and downs of the popular music world are revealed to a singer.

Title: Bombay Talkie
Overview: An English novelist travels to Bombay to watch one of her novels translated to film. She chases after the Movie's leading man while the Screenwriter chases after her.

Title: Aliisa
Overview: A finnish TV-movie by Jukka Sipilä

Title: Night Chase
Tagline: A man fleeing the scene of his wife's shooting forms an unexpected relationship with the tough cab driver he hires to drive him to the Mexican border.
Overview: A man fleeing the scene of his wife's shooting forms an unexpected relationship with the tough cab driver he hires to drive him to the Mexican border.

Title: The Chinese Boxer
Tagline: See The Sweeping Hand of Death Strike Without Mercy!
Overview: Lei Ming, a noble young martial arts student who doesn't know the meaning of giving up. He faces a treacherous, blood-thirsty Japanese karate expert, which leads to many memorable battles as well as several unforgettable training sequences.

Title: The Hart of London
Overview: A surreal sequence of images of nature and London, Ontario, life and death.

Title: The Devil's Widow
Overview: Based on an ancient Scottish folk song, an older woman uses witchcraft to keep her young jet-set friends.

Title: Run, Simon, Run
Tagline: A red man and white woman bound by a love that death can't destroy.
Overview: A Papago Indian returns to his reservation after a prison term and searches for his brother's killer.

Title: Distracted
Overview: A comedy about an absent-minded man who works at a advertising company and topples from one problem to another.

Title: Queens Of Evil
Overview: A young hippie kills a man, and seeks refuge at the lakeside house of three beautiful sisters, who seem to be hiding a dark secret.

Title: There's a Girl in My Soup
Tagline: Soup's on!
Overview: TV personality Robert Danvers, an exceedingly vain rotter, seduces young women daily, never staying long with one. He meets his match in Marion, an American, 19, who's available but refuses any romantic illusions.
Original Title: There's a Girl in My Soup

Title: When Women Had Tails
Overview: Cavemen Ulli (Giuliano Gemma), Kao (Lando Buzzanca), Grrr, Put, Zog, Maluo and Uto meet Filli (Senta Berger) with the light-brown tail.
Original Title: Quando le donne avevano la coda

Title: Take a Girl Like You
Tagline: In this day and age what's a virgin to do?
Overview: Young Jenny heads to the South of England to start a new career as a school teacher. Even before she has had a chance to settle in she meets Patrick, one of the local "lads". Within a short time she has her hands full when a number of the local boys take a liking to her. But who will be the lucky one who wins her affections?

Title: Rio Lobo
Tagline: Give 'Em Hell, John.
Overview: After the Civil War, Cord McNally searches for the traitor whose perfidy caused the defeat of McNally's unit and the loss of a close friend.

Title: Donkey Skin
Overview: A fairy godmother helps a princess disguise herself so she won't have to marry her father.

Title: Sympathy for the Underdog
Overview: A yakuza gang gets driven out of Yokohama by a big gang from Tokyo. They relocate to Okinawa to violently start over.

Title: Old Men: Robbers
Overview: An old detective does not want to retire. The only way out is to prove to his boss that he still can catch criminals. The problem is that there were no crimes recently to work on. Together with his retired friend he decides to commit a perfect crime himself and then quickly solve it. Real problems start when a real criminal steals money he has stolen.

Title: The Night Visitor
Tagline: Locked in the cold asylum of his mind - a sane man stalks his prey...
Overview: An insane Swedish farmer escapes from an asylum to get revenge on his sister, her husband and others.

Title: Synchromy
Overview: The film's soundtrack is an original musical composition produced with synthetic sound - through photographing unusual geometric shapes and running them through an optical sound head. The images are an artistic rendering of this soundtrack.

Title: A Girl in Australia
Overview: The film is about an old fashioned Italian with moral values of the 1930/40's ,who has to find a wife in the modern, woman's liberated society of Australia of the 1960/70's.
Original Title: Bello, onesto, emigrato Australia sposerebbe compaesana illibata

Title: La Région Centrale
Overview: A 1971 experimental Canadian film directed by Michael Snow. Shot in the Canadian mountains over a period of 24 hours using a robotic arm.

Title: A Flower
Overview: A boy grows a seed into a flower while the world around him marches on.

Title: Persuasion
Overview: Adaptation of the Jane Austen novel.

Title: Sense and Sensibility
Overview: Adaptation of the Jane Austen novel.

Title: The Thorn
Tagline: More than a movie, it's a happening.
Overview: In her film debut, Bette Midler portrays the Virgin Mary in a biting satire of the commercialization of religion.

Title: Bleak Moments
Overview: Moments from the uncompromisingly bleak existence of a secretary, her retarded sister, aloof and uneasy teacher boyfriend, bizzare neighbour and irritating workmate.

Title: The Big Doll House
Tagline: Their bodies were caged, but not their desires. They would do anything for a man - or to him.
Overview: Female prisoners in a Phillippine jail are being subjected to sadistic torture. Five of the women--along with the help of two men--plot an escape.

Title: Zachariah
Tagline: A head of his time
Overview: Two gunfighters separate and experience surreal visions on their journey through the west.

Title: Lust for a Vampire
Tagline: A vampire's lust knows no boundaries...
Overview: In 1830, the Karnstein heirs use the blood of an innocent to bring forth the evil that is the beautiful Mircalla - or as she was in 1710, Carmilla. The nearby Finishing School offers rich pickings not only in in the blood of nubile young ladies but also with the headmaster who is desperate to become Mircalla's disciple, and the equally besotted and even more foolish author Richard Lestrange.

Title: Dr. Cook's Garden
Overview: A young doctor returns to his New England home town after a long absence. He visits with the town's kindly old physician, Dr. Cook, a man he has admired since childhood. However, he soon finds out that the old doctor isn't quite what he seems to be, and the young doctor finds his life in danger.

Title: The Point!
Overview: Years ago, there was a place called The Land of Point, because everything in The Land of Point had one: the barns, the houses, the cars, everything, even the people. Everyone in The Land of Point had a point at the top of its head. Everyone, that is, except Oblio, who was born round-headed. Since he had no point, Oblio, along with his trusty dog, Arrow, was banished to the Pointless Forest. Join them to see what wonders await these two intrepid travelers as they make their way on their amazing, song-filled journey of discovery!

Title: Rio das Mortes
Overview: Michel and Guenther, working in dead-end jobs, are obsessed with going to Peru to find buried treasure, using a map of the Rio das Mortes. Michel's girlfriend, Hanna, humors their plan, but really just wants to get married.

Title: Colpo grosso, grossissimo...anzi probabile
Overview: Italian comedy

Title: The Pursuit of Happiness
Overview: William Popper is the son of a stockbroker and is thoroughly disenchanted with "the system." So much so that even though he can prove that he ran over a woman in his car entirely by accident, he accepts a sentence for manslaughter.

Title: Blue Water, White Death
Overview: Peter Gimbel and a team of photographers set out on an expedition to find and Film, for the very first time, Carcharodon carcharias....The Great White Shark. The Expedition took over nine months and traveled from Durban, South Africa, across the Indian Ocean and finally to South Australia.

Title: When Eight Bells Toll
Overview: In a vein similar to Bond movies, a British agent Philip Calvert is on a mission to determine the whereabouts of a ship that disappeared near the coast of Scotland.

Title: Popsy Pop
Tagline: She'd do anything to help them with the heist... and then everything to keep the haul for her own little beautiful self!
Overview: Claudia Cardinale is Popsy, who double-crosses her older partner Silva (Stanley Baker). Silva has arranged to divert diamonds from a large corporate-run diamond mine in the South American jungle, and Popsy does her “pop” wrong as they are both pursued by police.

Title: The Cat in the Hat
Overview: In a marvelously animated version of one of the most beloved of all Dr. Seuss tales, two youngsters find themselves at home with nothing to do on a rainy afternoon. But when the magical, mischievous Cat in the Hat arrives on the scene, they're all cat-apulted into a day of rousing, romping, outlandish antics they - and you - will never forget!

Title: Melody
Tagline: A tender love story for everyone who was ever ten years old.
Overview: Two youngsters declare to their parents that they want to get married. Not sometime in the future but as soon as possible.

Title: Just Before Nightfall
Overview: A married man (Michel Bouquet) who killed the wife of his best friend during a tryst feels compelled to turn himself in.

Title: Flight of the Doves
Tagline: Something special is coming your way!
Overview: While fleeing across the Irish countryside, two orphans are pursued by their villainous uncle, a master of disguises.

Title: Dig Your Grave Friend... Sabata's Coming
Overview: Steve McGowan has proposed to avenge the death of his father, murdered by one of the followers of Chief Miller. This engages the services of a famous gunslinger called Sabata and instructs him to  kill Steve. The fate joins Steve and the Mexican bandit Leon Pompero, and together they decide to defeat the murderous gunman.
Original Title: Abre tu fosa, amigo, llega Sábata...

Title: The Married Couple of the Year Two
Overview: Nicolas Philibert goes to America after killing a French aristocrat. On his return he tries to divorce his wife, Charlotte, but when he sees others trying to woo her his own interest is rekindled.

Title: Summer of '42
Tagline: In everyone's life there's a "Summer of '42"
Overview: Silent as a painting, the movie shows us day-dreamer Hermie and his friends Oscy and Benjie spending the summer of '42 on an US island with their parents - rather unaffected by WWII. While Oscy's main worries are the when and how of getting laid, Hermie honestly falls in love with the older Dorothy, who's married to an army pilot. When her husband returns to the front, Hermie shyly approaches her. Written by Bob Dawson

Title: Valdez Is Coming
Tagline: They Tore His Body. They Buried His Pride. But They Forgot His Old Uniform, His Sharp Knife and His Buffalo Gun. Find Tanner, El Segundo and the 16 Others. And Tell Them Valdez Is Coming.
Overview: A Mexican-American sheriff must resort to violence against a powerful rancher in order to get just compensation for the pregnant Indian widow of a wrongly killed black man.

Title: The Sudden Wealth of the Poor People of Kombach
Overview: An intriguing Hans Christian Anderson-style fairy tale aesthetic and voice over narration. Sudden Wealth is a despairing chronicle of a group of starving peasants who finally seize governmental wealth like a dysfunctional group of Robin Hood's Merry Men, only to be betrayed by their inescapable selves and systematically dehumanized (think bucolic Orwell) and reprogrammed by what we'll put under the rubric of God and Country.
Original Title: Der plötzliche Reichtum der armen Leute von Kombach

Title: The Shiver of the Vampires
Overview: A young honeymooning couple stop for the night at an ancient castle. Unbeknownst to them, the castle is home to a horde of vampires, who have their own plans for the couple.

Title: Murmur of the Heart
Tagline: A souffle of a movie!
Overview: In the end of the first Indochina War, an open-minded teenage boy finds himself between the urge to discover love and the ever-present, dominating affection of his mother.

Title: Bananas
Overview: When a bumbling New Yorker is dumped by his activist girlfriend, he travels to a tiny Latin American nation and becomes involved in its latest rebellion.

Title: Byelorussian Station
Overview: The heroes of the movie last seen each other on the Belarusian railway station in the summer of 1945. A quarter-century, they meet at the funeral of comrade.

Title: Hydrozagadka
Overview: No overview found.

Title: The Hellstrom Chronicle
Tagline: Shocking. Beautiful. Brilliant. Sensual. Deadly...and in the end, only they will survive.
Overview: A scientist explains how the savagery and efficiency of the insect world could result in their taking over the world.

Title: The Road Builder
Tagline: A lonely woman in a decaying mansion... A young stranger on a big, black bike.
Overview: The dreary existence of middle-aged spinster Maura Prince takes an unexpected turn with the arrival of young handyman Billy Jarvis, but there is more to Billy than meets the eye.  Based on the novel *Nest in a Fallen Tree* by Joy Cowley.

Title: Taking Off
Overview: Unable to deal with her parents, Jeannie Tyne runs away from home. Larry and Lyne Tyne search for her, and in the process meet other people whose children ran away. With their children gone, the parents are now free to rediscover/enjoy life.

Title: The Corpse Grinders
Tagline: They Went in People and Came Out Hamburger!
Overview: When the Lotus Cat Food Company finds itself in financial trouble, the owners decide to find a new, cheap source of meat -- the local graveyard. Only one problem -- soon cats develop a taste for human flesh, and tabbies are tearing out throats all over town.

Title: Escape from the Planet of the Apes
Tagline: Meet baby Milo who has Washington terrified.
Overview: The world is shocked by the appearance of two talking chimpanzees, who arrived mysteriously in a U.S. spacecraft. They become the toast of society; but one man believes them to be a threat to the human race.
Original Title: Escape from the Planet of the Apes

Title: Mrs. Pollifax: Spy
Tagline: Before she joined the CIA, Mrs. Polifax thought Red China was a set of dishes.
Overview: Mrs. Pollifax-Spy (1971) is a comedy film directed by Leslie H. Martinson, starring Rosalind Russell and Darren McGavin, and released by United Artists. This was Russell's last theatrical film role, with one TV movie in 1972. Russell adapted the novel The Unexpected Mrs. Pollifax, written by Dorothy Gilman under the pseudonym C. A. McKnight.

Title: The Grissom Gang
Tagline: The psychotic killer, the young heiress...the kidnapping that becomes a love story.
Overview: The Grissom Gang is a remake of the notorious 1949 British melodrama No Orchids For Miss Blandish. Kim Darby plays a 1920s-era debutante who is kidnapped and held for ransom. Her captors are the Grissoms, a family comprised of sadists and morons, and headed by Ma Barker clone Irene Dailey. One of the Grissoms, played by Scott Wilson, takes a liking to his prisoner, which results in a bloody breakdown of the family unit. Both The Grissom Gang and the original No Orchids For Miss Blandish were inspired by the best-seller by James Hadley Chase, though neither film retains Chase's original ending.

Title: Baba Yaga
Overview: No overview found.

Title: Fata Morgana
Overview: Footage shot in and around the Sahara Desert, accompanied only by a spoken creation myth and the songs of Leonard Cohen.

Title: The Policeman
Overview: Azulai is a policeman in Jaffa, whose incompetence is only matched by his soft-heartedness. His superiors want to send him to early retirement, but he would like to stay on the force, and the criminals of Jaffa don't want to see him leave either...

Title: The Deadly Trap
Tagline: Murder and Madness is THE DEADLY TRAP.
Overview: An industrial-espionage group calls on a retired spy (Frank Langella) living with his wife (Faye Dunaway) and children in Paris. To force him back to his old job, his children will be kidnapped.

Title: Drive, He Said
Overview: Hector is a star basketball player for the College basketball team he plays for, the Leopards. His girlfriend, Olive, doesn't know whether to stay with him or leave him. And his friend, Gabriel, who may have dropped out from school and become a protestor, wants desperately not to get drafted for Vietnam.

Title: Who Is Harry Kellerman and Why Is He Saying Those Terrible Things About Me?
Overview: Georgie Soloway, a pop hit love song writer who cannot love, himself, or others. He spends his days with various women flying his plane, and dropping in to the world around him.
Original Title: Who Is Harry Kellerman and Why Is He Saying Those Terrible Things About Me?

Title: The Anderson Tapes
Tagline: The Crime of the Century!
Overview: A thief (Duke Anderson) just released from ten years in jail, takes up with his old girlfriend (Ingrid) in her posh apartment. He makes plans to rob the entire building. What he doesn't know is that his every move is recorded on audio and video tape, although he is not the subject of any surveillance.

Title: Scandalous John
Overview: A crotchety old ranch owner fights to be able to live his life the way he wants to, and not the way other people--and the law--tell him he has to.

Title: Von Richthofen and Brown
Overview: The story of Manfred von Richtofen, the german air ace during the World War I and his struggle with the enemy aces and some jealous german officers.

Title: A mí las mujeres ni fu ni fa
Overview: Pedro is a famous singer who fall in love with a psychiatrist girlfriend, he decides to attend to the doctor with the story that he does not like women. The psychiatric nurse helps him with the girl as she is in love with the doctor.
Original Title: A mí las mujeres ni fu ni fa

Title: Sunday Bloody Sunday
Tagline: It's about three decent people. They will break your heart.
Overview: Recently divorced career woman Alex Greville begins a romantic relationship with glamorous mod artist Bob Elkin, fully aware that he's also intimately involved with middle-aged doctor Daniel Hirsh. For both Alex and Daniel, the younger man represents a break with their repressive pasts, and though both know that Bob is seeing both of them, neither is willing to let go of the youth and vitality he brings to their otherwise stable lives.

Title: Shaft
Tagline: The mob wanted Harlem back. They got shaft...up to here.
Overview: Cool black private eye John Shaft is hired by a crime lord to find and retrieve his kidnapped daughter.

Title: The Touch
Tagline: The Touch is the total expression of love.
Overview: A seemingly happy Swedish housewife and mother begins an adulterous affair with a foreign archaeologist who is working near her home.

Title: Gamera vs. Zigra
Overview: A moon base is destroyed by a spaceship with a cluster of gumballs on its head. Later, at Sea World, dolphins are dying mysteriously. Zigra kidnaps two men and two children (one of whom is a Coke addict - Coca-Cola that is) and starts causing earthquakes. The two six year olds somehow outwit Zigra and help their incapacitated fathers escape. The Zigra Woman, who can use her eyes to put people into comas, then chases them all over Sea World like an extended Benny Hill skit. Somewhere in this movie Gamera finally shows up, fights Zigra, who turns into a giant swordfish.

Title: Wake in Fright
Tagline: Have a drink, mate? Have a fight, mate? Have some dust and sweat, mate? There's nothing else out here.
Overview: Wake in Fright is the story of John Grant, a bonded teacher who arrives in the rough outback mining town of Bundanyabba planning to stay overnight before catching the plane to Sydney, but as one night stretches into several he plunges headlong into his own destruction.

Title: Willard
Tagline: This is Willard and his friend Ben. Ben will do anything for Willard.
Overview: A social misfit, Willard is made fun of by his co-workers, and squeezed out of the company started by his deceased father by his boss. His only friends are a couple of rats he raised at home, Ben and Socrates. (And their increasing number of friends) However, when one of them is killed at work, he goes on a rampage using his rats to attack those who have been tormenting him.

Title: Clay Pigeon
Tagline: Joe Ryan had but one life to give for his country. The CIA asked for it twice.
Overview: An ex-soldier is recruited by the FBI to go undercover in L.A. and find other ex-soldiers who are part of a drug-dealing gang.

Title: Requiem for a Vampire
Tagline: Two young girls...trapped..with no escape! Forced to submit to the Horrors of the Pit!
Overview: A vampire lures beautiful young women to his castle in Europe.

Title: The Omega Man
Tagline: The World Is Dead. One Survivor. Then The Others. Crawling In Darkness. The Strangest Sect Of All. *Hunting The Last Man On Earth.*
Overview: Robert Neville, a doctor, due to an experimental vaccine, is the only survivor of an apocalyptic war waged with biological weapons. The plague caused by the war has killed everyone else except for a few hundred deformed, nocturnal people calling themselves "The Family". The plague has caused them to become sensitive to light, as well as homicidally psychotic.

Title: Billy Jack
Tagline: When you need him, he's always there!
Overview: Ex-Green Beret hapkido expert saves wild horses from being slaughtered for dog food and helps protect a desert "freedom school" for runaway.

Title: Night of Dark Shadows
Tagline: Just another night of... Terror.
Overview: A painter and his wife move into a home and find themselves plagued by ghosts and spirits of his ancestors that used to be witches.

Title: Let's Scare Jessica to Death
Tagline: Nightmare or sanity... which is which?
Overview: Newly released from a mental ward, Jessica hopes to return to life the way it was before her nervous breakdown. But when Jessica moves to a country house with her husband and a close friend, she finds a mysterious girl living in there who may or may not be a vampire. Jessica's terror and paranoia resurface as evil forces surround her, making her wonder: Are the visions real or is she slipping back into madness?

Title: Brother John
Tagline: Brother John just blew into town...and the town is about to blow apart!
Overview: A mysterious man John Kane (Sidney Poitier) who, when he returns to his hometown in Alabama for his sister's funeral, is thought to be an outside labor agitator - until it's revealed that he's really a heavenly messenger. The plot revolves around a strike at the town's big factory.

Title: Shoot Out
Tagline: He's Out of Jail, and Ready for Revenge
Overview: Clay Lomax, a bank robber, gets out of jail after an 7 year sentence. He is looking after Sam Foley, the man who betrayed him. Knowing that, Foley hires three men to pay attention of Clay's steps. The things get complicated when Lomax, waiting to receive some money from his ex-lover, gets only the notice of her death and an 7 year old girl, sometimes very annoying, presumed to be his daughter.

Title: The Night Evelyn Came out of the Grave
Tagline: The worms are waiting.
Overview: A wealthy English lord is suffering a mental breakdown following the death of his red-headed wife, Evelyn, whom he feared was cheating on him. He tours local bars and dives, scouring for lovely red-heads willing to come back to his decaying castle in the country, where he seduces them, then tortures and kills them. His friend the doctor talks him into marrying again to help heal his slowly-rotting mind, which he does--but are the doctor's orders really what he needs?
Original Title: La notte che Evelyn uscì dalla tomba

Title: I Hate Mondays
Overview: Funny adeventures of few person including the unlucky Italian guest, in Warsaw, on Monday.

Title: Return of Sabata
Tagline: The man with gunsight eyes is back!
Overview: Master gunslinger Sabata arrives in Hobsonville, a town completely owned by McIntock, a robber baron who is taxing the inhabitants for the cost of future improvements to the town. Or that's what McIntock says he'll do with the money...
Original Title: È tornato Sabata... hai chiuso un'altra volta!

Title: To Catch a Spy
Overview: While on vacation, a woman's husband is taken by the Russian government. After one attempt fails, she begins looking for a suitable spy to capture and trade in exchange for her husband, but she develops an attraction to the one she thinks is a good candidate.

Title: Shadow
Overview: Musical tale about a struggle between a good Scientist and his evil Shadow.

Title: Glen and Randa
Overview: Teenagers Glen and Randa are members of a tribe that lives in a rural area, several decades after nuclear war has devastated the planet. They know nothing of the outside world, except that Glen has read about and seen pictures of a great city in some old comic books. He and Randa set out to find this city.

Title: A Bullet for a Stranger
Overview: John and George McIntire are a couple of naive brothers who travel to a lawless western town to see their father. The bumbling siblings get themselves into big trouble after they beat up a member of a gang of extortionists. Fortunately, a mysterious roving gunfighter decides to help the guys out of their jam.
Original Title: Gli fumavano le Colt... lo chiamavano Camposanto

Title: The Go-Between
Overview: Tale of torrid and forbidden love between Christie and Bates in the English countryside.

Title: The Trojan Women
Overview: The women of Troy face enslavement after the fall of their city.

Title: The Peace Killers
Tagline: They ride to love... They ride to kill!
Overview: Siblings Kristy and Jeffrey are buying supplies at a remote desert gas station when some members of a biker gang come cruising in. The bikers recognize Kristy, who used to be the main squeeze of the gang's leader before she ran away. The pair get away, but the bikers find out that they're living in a nearby commune, and start making their battle plans to bring Kristy back.

Title: The Big Boss
Tagline: Every Limb Of His Body Is A Lethal Weapon!!!
Overview: Chen is a city boy who moves with his cousins to work at an ice factory. He does this with a family promise never to get involved in any fight. However, when members of his family begin disappearing after meeting the management of the factory, the resulting mystery and pressures force him to break that vow and take on the villainy of the Big Boss.

Title: Battle of the Amazons
Tagline: Hell hath no fury like 10,000 women!
Overview: A tribe of vicious female warriors terrorizes the countryside, and especially the males, until one day the men and some local villagers decide to fight back.
Original Title: Le amazzoni - donne d'amore e di guerra

Title: Roma bene
Overview: Nino Manfredi is a police captain, giving an onlooker's point-of-view towards the decadent society folk. Party itself features a down & out baron, who dances with the party's glamorous hostess Virna Lisi so that he can steal her valuable earrings. When they're missing, she's angry enough to call in the cops (Manfredi shows up) and have the baron taken away.

Title: Thief
Overview: A professional thief tries to break with his past but has to pull off one last job to pay off a gambling debt.

Title: Bless the Beasts & Children
Tagline: Only one animal kills just for the sport of it... Guess which...
Overview: Six children at a summer camp embark on a mission to save a buffalo herd from slaughter.

Title: You and Me
Overview: A neurosurgeon returns back to the USSR from Sweden and has to deal with rejection - both at work and at home.

Title: The Case Is Closed, Forget It
Overview: Because of a violation of traffic regulations an architect is put in prison. There he witnesses the grim reality of life behind bars: corrupt staff, corrupt inmates, an inhuman judicial system and the power of the Mafia.

Title: The Salamander
Overview: Two men, arty though somewhat staid, are drawn to the spirited and quixotic Rosemonde....

Title: A Town Called Hell
Tagline: Vengeance's fire is raging.
Overview: A group of Mexican revolutionaries murders a town priest and a number of his christian followers. Ten years later, a widow arrives in town intent to take revenge from her husband's killers.

Title: Why
Overview: Giuseppe Di Noi, an Italian surveyor living in Switzerland, gets arrested at the border while going back to Italy with his family for a vacation. But can someone tell the man WHY?

Title: Whoever Slew Auntie Roo?
Tagline: She's Taking A STAB At Motherhood!
Overview: A demented widow lures unsuspecting children into her mansion in a bizarre "Hansel and Gretel" twist.

Title: Fiddler on the Roof
Tagline: To Life!
Overview: This lavishly produced and critically acclaimed screen adaptation of the international stage sensation tells the life-affirming story of Tevye (Topol), a poor milkman whose love, pride and faith help him face the oppression of turn-of-the-century Czarist Russia. Nominated for eight Academy Awards.

Title: Face-Off
Tagline: A story of two people... two worlds... one love
Overview: Love story involving a Canadian professional hockey player and a hippie folk singer. Their union is tumultuous, as both try to come to terms with their differences in careers and lifestyles.

Title: Mon oncle Antoine
Overview: Set in cold rural Quebec at Christmas time, we follow the coming of age of a young boy and the life of his family which owns the town's general store and undertaking business.  Mon Oncle Antoine is Director Claude Jutra's masterpiece: A poignant, starkly honest, but humane film, shot through with authenticity from beginning to end.  Realized with an unflagging artistic vision, Mon Oncle Antoine poetically portrays a young boy's coming of age, vividly capturing the Quebec mining town in which he lives.

Title: Brian's Song
Overview: Based on the real-life relationship between teammates Brian Piccolo and Gale Sayers and the bond established when Piccolo discovers that he is dying.

Title: Family Life
Overview: A 19 years old London girl received agressive psychiatric treatments for her schizophrenic behaviour by a doctor who still wants her family to insure the guard of the child without any regards to the facts that it is this family who's agravating her situation.

Title: Chandler
Tagline: Chandler is a private eye. It's a hard way to make a living... and an easy way to die.
Overview: A private eye (Warren Oates) is hired to follow a mobster's former mistress (Leslie Caron).

Title: The Devil with Seven Faces
Overview: Carroll Baker plays a dual role as translator Julie Harrison and her twin sister Mary. The serpentine plot begins as Julie tells her lawyer Dave Barton (Stephen Boyd) that Mary's life is being threatened in London while Julie herself is being stalked by a mysterious stranger in Amsterdam.

Title: Made For Each Other
Overview: The pair who created "Lovers and Other Strangers" take on marriage and other impossibilities.

Title: Gentlemen of Fortune
Overview: A kindergarten director Troshkin is a dead ringer for a criminal nicknamed "Docent" who stole the priceless...

Title: The Hospital
Tagline: Madness, Murder and Malpractice.
Overview: A suicidal doctor struggles to find meaning in his life while a murderer stalks the halls of his hospital.

Title: Tora-san's Love Call
Overview: Taking a message from Hiroshi's father to heart, Torajiro attempts to give up his wandering ways.
Original Title: Otoko wa tsurai yo: Torajiro koiuta

Title: In the Shadow of Death
Overview: A group of men go under-ice fishing, but find themselves trapped on a piece of ice, that has broken off. As they are drifting through the sea, the tension between them rises.

Title: Pictures of the Old World
Overview: A visual essay on the forgotten parts of Eastern Europe. The outskirts here are a Slovakian town in the Tatra Mountains. Though censored for 17 years, Dusan Hanáks poetic visual essay is not a political or even social film. It goes to far deeper and more fundamental levels of human experience. Inspired by the photographs of Martin Martinek, the films power lies in its unusual portraits of people whose raw visual beauty radiates from their very souls

Title: Snowball Express
Overview: When John Baxter inherits a ski resort in the Rocky Mountains, he quits his job in New York and moves the family west to run it. Only to find that the place is a wreck. But together they decide to try to fix it up and run it. But Martin Ridgeway, who wants the property, does everything he can to ensure it will fail.

Title: Monologue
Overview: Professor Sretenski is a scientist and director of a research center in Russia. He is separated from his wife and lives alone. His daughter, who lives with the mother, comes to his home and stays with him for a period, leaving her daughter with him. He raises his granddaughter, feeling a great affection for her.

Title: Emma
Overview: Adaptation of the Jane Austen novel.

Title: A Day in the Death of Joe Egg
Overview: A couple uses extremely black comedy to survive taking care of a daughter who is nearly completely brain dead. They take turns doing the daughter's voice and stare into the eyes of death and emotional trauma with a humour that hides their pain.
Original Title: A Day in the Death of Joe Egg

Title: Winnie-the-Pooh and a Busy Day
Overview: Another Russian Pooh story. This time the donkey, known from the Pooh stories as Eyeore, is sad because he has no tail. Pooh goes in search of one and finds it attached to a bell that hangs from the treehouse of one Owl.

Title: The Audience
Overview: Caustic satire on bureaucracy of the Vatican authority and a simple Italian who wants to achieve the audience with the Pope.

Title: Prata Palomares
Overview: While waiting for directions, two revolutionaries hide in a church, where they meet a woman who wants to have a son with one of them.

Title: Pocket Money
Tagline: The two most memorable characters the West can never forget!
Overview: Broke and in debt, an otherwise honest cowboy gets mixed up in some shady dealings with a crooked rancher.

Title: Chato's Land
Tagline: What Chato's land doesn't kill, Chato will.
Overview: A posse pursues Pardon Chato (Charles Bronson) a mestizo indian after he killed a US marshal in self-defense. As they get deeper into Indian territory, just who is hunting who.

Title: The Muppet Musicians of Bremen
Overview: Four mistreated farm animals seek refuge as a band of traveling musicians in this musical tale narrated by Kermit the Frog.

Title: Out 1: Spectre
Overview: Out 1: Spectre begins as nothing more than scenes from Parisian life; only as time goes by do we realize that there is a plot—perhaps playful, perhaps sinister—that implicates not just the thirteen characters, but maybe everyone, everywhere. Real life may be nothing but an enormous yarn someone somewhere is spinning...

Title: On Reflection: B.S. Johnson on Dr. Samuel Johnson
Overview: Directed by B.S. Johnson.
Original Title: On Reflection: B.S. Johnson on Dr. Samuel Johnson

Title: The Old Maid
Overview: Muriel is a shy woman who bluffs and blusters around in order to hide her shyness and to protect her loneliness, even though she longs wistfully for a companion of some sort. She has been lonely so long that now she is an old maid and has never been wooed. In this gentle French film, Muriel gets a glimpse of romance when Gabriel walks into the seaside hotel she is vacationing in. His car has broken down, and he has to stay there for a few days while it is repaired. Hers is the only dinner table with room at it, and Gabriel cannot prevent himself from charming women. She is stiff with him at first, but soon they develop a friendship.

Title: Madame Sin
Overview: A CIA agent is used as a pawn in an insane woman's plan to steal a Polaris submarine.

Title: Blood of Ghastly Horror
Tagline: Human zombies rise from their coffins as living corpses!
Overview: A mad scientist implants an electronic device into the brain of an injured soldier, which turns him into a psychotic killer.

Title: Something Evil
Overview: A young couple moves into a farmhouse in rural Pennsylvania. What they don't know is that there is an unseen presence in the house, and that it wants to take possession of the wife.

Title: The Hot Rock
Tagline: How many times does it take to steal the same diamond?
Overview: Dortmunder and his pals plan to steal a huge diamond from a museum. But this turns out to be only the first time they have to steal it...

Title: The Lorax
Overview: The Once-ler, a ruined industrialist, tells the tale of his rise to wealth and subsequent fall, as he disregarded the warnings of a wise old forest creature called the Lorax about the environmental destruction caused by his greed.

Title: Silent Running
Tagline: Amazing companions on an incredible journey...that journeys beyond imagination!
Overview: In a future Earth barren of all flora and fauna, the planet's ecosystems exist only in large pods attached to spacecraft. When word comes in that the pods are to be jettisoned into space and destroyed so that the spacecraft can be reused for commercial purposes, most of the crew of the Valley Forge rejoice at the prospect of going home. Not so for botanist Freeman Lowell who loves the forest and its creatures, so decides to take matters into his own hands to protect what he loves.

Title: Red Psalm
Overview: Set in the 1890s on the Hungarian plains, a group of farm workers go on strike in which they face harsh reprisals and the reality of revolt, oppression, morality and violence.

Title: What Have You Done to Solange?
Overview: After several coeds are murdered at a college, a professor (Fabio Testi) who is involved with a student becomes a suspect, along with several other male and female teachers.

Title: Godzilla vs. Gigan
Overview: Godzilla's 12th film. After a accepting a job at a monster-themed park, a man learns his new employers are actually aliens who plan to use Ghidorah and Gigan to destroy earth.  Godzilla and Anguirus must battle them to defend earth.
Original Title: 地球攻撃命令 ゴジラ対ガイガン

Title: The Godfather
Tagline: An offer you can't refuse.
Overview: Spanning the years 1945 to 1955, a chronicle of the fictional Italian-American Corleone crime family. When organized crime family patriarch, Vito Corleone barely survives an attempt on his life, his youngest son, Michael steps in to take care of the would-be killers, launching a campaign of bloody revenge.

Title: Roma
Tagline: The fall of the Roman Empire 1931-1972.
Overview: A virtually plotless, gaudy, impressionistic portrait of Rome through the eyes of one of its most famous citizens.

Title: Slaughterhouse-Five
Tagline: Billy Pilgrim lives - from time to time.
Overview: "Listen: Billie Pilgrim has come unstuck in time." Slaughterhouse-Five is an award-winning 1972 film adaptation of Kurt Vonnegut's novel of the same name. Director Hill faithfully renders for the screen Vonnegut's obsessive story of Pilgrim, who survives the 1945 firebombing of Dresden, then lives simultaneously in his past, present, and future.

Title: Wild Honey
Tagline: Who says love has to last? It just has to be good.
Overview: Country girl comes to the big city, gets into all kinds of trouble.

Title: Pilate and Others
Overview: TV Drama from Wajda
Original Title: Pilatus und andere - Ein Film für Karfreitag

Title: It Can Be Done, Amigo
Overview: An outspoken boy and a gunfighter-pimp save a drifter's life from hanging. The boy's uncle dies, leaving a house and some dry, useless land to the boy. The dying uncle has obtained the drifter's promise to help the boy get what is his. Meanwhile the gunfighter has decided that the drifter should marry his daughter after being with her previously. The two get into a series of brawls and shoot-outs until they arrive in the town and find the boy's inheritance -which turns out not to be as useless as it first appears.

Title: Taming of the Fire
Overview: About Russian space program and missile industry, and it's founder Sergei P. Korolev, from the 1920s to the first man in space in 1961.

Title: Fritz the Cat
Tagline: We're not rated X for nothin', baby!
Overview: A hypocritical swinging college student cat raises hell in a satiric vision of various elements on the 1960's.

Title: A Bee in the Rain
Overview: This Portuguese drama examines the daily life minutiae and intrigues of two scions of society in the rural village where they live. One is a wealthy landowner, the other a widowed aristocrat who lives in a world of her own.

Title: Tout Va Bien
Overview: Godard examines the structure of movies, relationships and revolutions through the life of a couple in Paris.

Title: Night of the Devils
Tagline: Creatures of the Living Dead!
Overview: Night of the Devils is an Italian vampire thriller with a remarkably good pedigree. The script is based on The Wurdalak, a short story by A.K. Tolstoy. The central character is the patriarch of a wealthy family who fears that he will show up one day in vampire form. Should this happen, he warns his family not to let him back in his house, no matter how much he begs.

Title: Cousin Jules
Overview: 5 years in the life of a rural French farmer.

Title: Images
Overview: Schizophrenic housewife, engulfed by terrorizing apparitions, kills off each, unknowing if these demons are merely figments of her hallucinatory imagination or part of reality.

Title: Hungry Wives
Tagline: Every Night is Halloween.
Overview: A bored, unhappy suburban housewife gets mixed up in witchcraft and murder.

Title: Play It Again, Sam
Tagline: Here's laughing at you, kid.
Overview: A mild mannered film critic is dumped by his wife and his ego is crushed. His hero persona is the tough guy played by Humphrey Bogart in many of his movies and the apparition of Bogart begins showing up to give him advice. With the encouragement of his two married friends, he actually tries dating again, with less than satisfactory results, until he relaxes.

Title: How Far, How Near
Overview: A middle-aged man sets out on a symbolic journey through past, present, and future to learn why an old friend committed suicide, and learns much about his own life along the way.

Title: L'aventure c'est l'aventure
Overview: When they realize the times are changing, five crooks decide to switch from bank robberies to personality abductions.

Title: The Great Northfield Minnesota Raid
Tagline: The West the way it really was!
Overview: The gangs of Jesse James and Cole Younger join forces to rob the First National Bank in Northfield, Minnesota, but things do not go as planned.

Title: Tower of Evil
Tagline: One way in, no way out
Overview: A group of experienced archeologists are searching for an old and mystic Phoenician treasure when they are surprised by a series of mysterious murders...

Title: The Last Hours of a Virgin
Original Title: Le ultime ore di una vergine

Title: UFO... annientare S.H.A.D.O. stop. Uccidete Straker...
Original Title: UFO... annientare S.H.A.D.O. stop. Uccidete Straker...

Title: Skyjacked
Tagline: On Board Flight 502 Is A Bomb. It Could Be Anywhere. And A Skyjacker. It Could Be Anyone.
Overview: A crazed Vietnam vet bomber hijacks a Boeing 707 in this disaster film filled with the usual early '70s stereotypes, and demands to be taken to Russia.

Title: The Dead Are Alive
Tagline: There's No Place To Hide When The Dead Are Alive!
Overview: A photographer on an archaeological expedition digging up Etruscan ruins in Italy begins to suspect that not all the Etruscans buried there are actually dead.

Title: Frenzy
Tagline: Just an ordinary necktie used with a deadly new twist.
Overview: A serial murderer is strangling women with a necktie. The London police have a suspect, but he is the wrong man.

Title: The Final Comedown
Tagline: The man got down...the brothers were ready... You must see it! It's a mother!
Overview: Black revolutionaries take action in the white suburbs.

Title: The Valachi Papers
Overview: When Joe Valachi (Charles Bronson) has a price put on his head by Don Vito Genovese (Lino Ventura), he must take desperate steps to protect himself while in prison. An unsuccessful attempt to slit his throat puts him over the edge to break the sacred code of silence.

Title: The Way of the Dragon
Tagline: The Colosseum . . the battleground of Bruce Lee and Chuck Norris.
Overview: Tang Lung arrives in Rome to help his cousins in the restaurant business. They are being pressured to sell their property to the syndicate, who will stop at nothing to get what they want. When Tang arrives he poses a new threat to the syndicate, and they are unable to defeat him. The syndicate boss hires the best Japanese and European martial artists to fight Tang, but he easily finishes them off.

Title: My Childhood
Overview: The first part of Bill Douglas' influential trilogy harks back to his impoverished upbringing in early-'40s Scotland. Cinema was his only escape - he paid for it with the money he made from returning empty jam jars - and this escape is reflected most closely at this time of his life as an eight-year-old living on the breadline with his half-brother and sick grandmother in a poor mining village.

Title: The Long Recess
Overview: A young teacher goes to a school for adults. He is younger than many of his students and some of them are starting to miss school.

Title: Cops and Robbers
Overview: Two disillusioned New York policemen plan a $10 million robbery to fuel their low pensions, only to run into one debacle after another in the process.

Title: The Dawns Here Are Quiet
Overview: Based on the eponymous book by Boris Vasilyev, the film is set in Karelia (North-West of Russia, near Finland) in 1941 during WWII. In a beautiful and quiet wilderness far from the front-line there is an anti-aircraft artillery point, where corporal Vaskov is stationed with a group of many young women in training.

Title: Shaft's Big Score!
Tagline: Last time he was nice. This time he's ice!
Overview: John Shaft is back as the lady-loved black detective cop on the search for the murderer of a client.

Title: Boxcar Bertha
Tagline: Life made her an outcast. Love made her an outlaw.
Overview: Based on "Sister of the Road," the fictionalized autobiography of radical and transient Bertha Thompson as written by physician Dr. Ben L. Reitman, 'Boxcar' Bertha Thompson, a woman labor organizer in Arkansas during the violence-filled Depression of the early '30's meets up with rabble-rousing union man 'Big' Bill Shelly and they team up to fight the corrupt railroad establishment.

Title: A Place Called Today
Tagline: Fear Is Power! You Want Your City -- Fight For It!
Overview: Racial tensions arise when a black lawyer runs for mayor of a racially divided town.

Title: Beware! The Blob
Tagline: The movie that J.R. shot! (2000 US DVD release)
Overview: A technician brings a frozen specimen of the original Blob back from the North Pole. When his wife accidentally defrosts the thing, it terrorizes the populace, including the local hippies, kittens, and bowlers.

Title: Ben
Tagline: Where 'WILLARD' ended... Ben begins. And this time, he's not alone!
Overview: A lonely boy becomes good friends with Ben, a rat. This rat is also the leader of a pack of vicious killer rats, killing lots of people.

Title: Bone
Tagline: Love Bone Before He Loves You
Overview: A thief breaks into the home of a wealthy, happily married Beverly Hills couple. He soon finds out, though, that the couple is neither as wealthy as he thought they were and are not as happily married as they appeared.

Title: The Big Bird Cage
Tagline: Women so hot with desire they melt the chains that enslave them!
Overview: Grier and Haig are thieving mercenaries who engineer a prison break from the outside.

Title: Fuzz
Tagline: Here comes the fuzz
Overview: Police in Boston search for a mad bomber trying to extort money from the city.

Title: The Wrath of God
Tagline: They offered them a choice - THE FIRING SQUAD . . . or The Wrath of God
Overview: Set in the 1920s, several foreigners held by a South American military group are offered possible freedom if they accept to topple a local crazed military leader.

Title: Joe Kidd
Tagline: If you're looking for trouble - - - he's JOE KIDD
Overview: A band of Mexicans find their U. S. land claims denied and all the records destroyed in a courthouse fire. Their leader, Louis Chama, encourages them to use force to regain their land. A wealthy landowner wanting the same decides to hire a gang of killers with Joe Kidd to track Chama.

Title: Follow Me!
Overview: A strait-laced British banker hires an eccentric private detective to follow his free-spirited American wife, whom he suspects is cheating on him

Title: Fat City
Tagline: Life is what happens in between rounds.
Overview: Two men, working as professional boxers, come to blows when their careers each begin to take opposite momentum.

Title: Super Fly
Tagline: Never a dude like this one! He's got a plan to stick it to The Man!
Overview: Super Fly is a cocaine dealer who begins to realize that his life will soon end with either prison or his death. He decides to build an escape from the life by making his biggest deal yet.

Title: The Red Queen Kills Seven Times
Overview: The film starts out incredibly in a beautiful Gothic castle in Germany. As little girls, Kitty Wildenbrück and her sister Evelyn have been fighting when their grandfather tells them the story behind an incredibly uncanny painting: Legend has it that a fiendish Red Lady is to return to the castle every hundred years and kill seven people. Fourteen years later, Kitty (Barbara Bouchet) has become a successful fashion photographer. Suddenly, people begin to get murdered...
Original Title: La dama rossa uccide sette volte

Title: Ехали в трамвае Ильф и Петров
Original Title: Ехали в трамвае Ильф и Петров

Title: The Candidate
Tagline: Too Handsome. Too Young. Too Liberal. Doesn't have a chance. He's PERFECT!
Overview: Bill McKay is a candidate for the U.S. Senate from California. He has no hope of winning, so he is willing to tweak the establishment.

Title: The Postmaster
Overview: In the early 19th century a traveler returns to the remote outpost he’d visited years before, anxious to see the station master’s lovely daughter once again. There the brokenhearted old man tells him the story of the dashing fellow from Petersburg who whisked her away one winter morning.

Title: The Return of Halleluja
Overview: Ramirez, the general of the Mexican revolution against Maximilian who has been appointed king of Mexico, organizes his forces to attack the king's General, Miranda. Ramirez realizes that the Aztec Indians would be allies of great value, so he offers to return to them an idol statue that has been stolen from them. Only Alleluja is capable of retrieving the idol from the thieves.
Original Title: Il West ti va stretto, amico... è arrivato Alleluja

Title: Innocent Bystanders
Tagline: In this business there are no Innocent Bystanders
Overview: Washed-up agent John Craig is given the task of proving his worth by tracking down a Russian scientist on the run. Cross and double-cross is the name of the game.

Title: Private Parts
Tagline: Cheryl is a lovely girl... but to George, she's a living doll.
Overview: Teenage runaway Cheryl splits from Ohio and ends up in Los Angeles staying at an old rundown hotel full of weirdos. The weirdest of all is George and he has a crush on Cheryl.

Title: The Harder They Come
Tagline: With a Piece in His Hand He Takes on the Man!
Overview: Wishing to become a successful Reggae singer, a young Jamaican man finds himself tied to corrupt record producers and drug pushers.

Title: Enter the Dragon
Tagline: Their deadly mission: to crack the forbidden island of Han!
Overview: A martial artist agrees to spy on a reclusive crime lord using his invitation to a tournament there as cover.

Title: Snoopy, Come Home
Tagline: Snoopy travels to see his sick former owner and then feels obliged to return to her permanently.
Overview: When Snoopy receives a letter from his original owner Lila, he goes to visit her in the hospital while Charlie Brown and the gang are on the lookout for him. Suddenly, Snoopy feels that he must go live with Lila, but must say goodbye to all his friends. In his adventure to the hospital, he encounters numerous "No Dogs Allowed" signs, an annoying little girl who desires to keep him, and more!

Title: Jeremiah Johnson
Tagline: His Mountain. His Peace. His Great Hunts. His Young Bride. With All That, It Should Have Been Different.
Overview: A mountain man who wishes to live the life of a hermit becomes the unwilling object of a long vendetta by Indians when he proves to be the match of their warriors in one-to-one combat on the early frontier.

Title: And Hope to Die
Tagline: Wish Robert Ryan and Jean-Louis Trintignant luck!
Overview: A crook on the run hooks up with a criminal gang to commit a kidnapping. However, things don't go quite as planned.
Original Title: La course du lièvre à travers les champs

Title: Necromancy
Overview: Orson Welles plays the head of a witches' coven in the town of Lilith, where he needs the powers of Pamela Franklin to raise his son from the dead.

Title: Moon of the Wolf
Tagline: Deadly secrets emerge from the shadows when the full moon rises!
Overview: After several locals are viciously murdered, a Louisiana sheriff starts to suspect he may be dealing with a werewolf.

Title: Thumb Tripping
Tagline: The freeway isn't just a road... it's their way of life!
Overview: Gary and Shay are two happy-go-lucky flower children who hitchhike in the beautiful Big Sur-Monterey area of California.

Title: Hickey & Boggs
Tagline: They're Not Cool Slick Heroes.
Overview: Two veteran private eyes trigger a criminal reign of terror with their search for a missing girl.

Title: Night of the Lepus
Tagline: How many eyes does horror have?
Overview: Giant mutant rabbits terrorize the southwest!!

Title: The Mechanic
Tagline: He has 100 ways to kill... and they all work!
Overview: Arthur Bishop is a veteran hit man who, owing to his penchant for making his targets' deaths seem like accidents, thinks himself an artist. It's made him very rich, but as he hits middle age, he's so depressed and lonely that he takes on one of his victim's sons, Steve McKenna, as his apprentice. Arthur puts him through a rigorous training period and brings him on several hits. As Steven improves, Arthur worries that he'll discover who killed his father.

Title: Dionysus in '69
Tagline: A Celebration of Feeling, Loving, Wanting, Killing, Hearing, Tasting, Touching, Living
Overview: Filmed stageplay based on the ancient greek play The Bacchae written by Euripides. This play is performed by members of The Performance Group, an NYC experimental theater group who has made their own personal adaptation of this ancient text. Filmed by Brian De Palma.

Title: Pulp
Tagline: Write it. Live it. But try not to be it.
Overview: A seedy writer of sleazy pulp novels is recruited by a quirky, reclusive ex-actor to help him write his biography at his house in Malta.

Title: Remonstrance
Overview: A meta-film about a film and the common man in our own political reality. A reality that is just scenes of a film without any cinematic development, but which might be plain reality tomorrow.

Title: The Great Waltz
Tagline: The joyful, songful, wonderful story of the life of Johann Strauss!
Overview: A musical based on the life and music of Johnann Strauss, Jr.

Title: Swayamvaram
Overview: Vishwam and Sita, who resist the opposition from their families, elope and marry. The unemployed couple begin a happier married life, but soon land in a sea of perils without a source of income.

Title: The Tall Blond Man with One Black Shoe
Overview: Hapless orchestra player becomes an unwitting pawn of rival factions within the French secret service after he is chosen as a decoy by being identified as a super secret agent.
Original Title: Le grand blond avec une chaussure noire

Title: What?
Tagline: The kinkiest caper of the year!
Overview: A young American woman traveling through Italy finds herself in a strange Mediterranean villa where nothing seems right.

Title: Travels with My Aunt
Overview: A stodgy young man gets caught up in his free-living aunt"s shady schemes.

Title: Child's Play
Tagline: You only lose once.
Overview: At an exclusive boys' school, a new gym teacher is drawn into a feud between two older instructors, and he discovers that everything at the school is not quite as staid, tranquil and harmless as it seems.

Title: The Phone Box
Overview: A man gets trapped inside a telephone box and nobody is able to free him.

Title: The Gore Gore Girls
Tagline: In screaming color
Overview: A ditsy reporter enlists the help of a sleazy private eye to solve a series of gory killings of female strippers at a Chicago nightclub.

Title: Panda! Go Panda!
Overview: The plot follows Mimiko, a bright little girl left alone when her grandmother leaves on a trip. Making a few stops at some local stores, Mimiko comes home to her house in a bamboo grove and finds a baby panda named Panny sleeping on the back doorstep. She quickly makes friends with the little panda, and invites him in for a drink. His father, PapaPanda, soon comes to visit, and they decide to become a family after PapaPanda offers to.

Title: Black Gunn
Tagline: For every drop of black blood spilled...A white man pays.
Overview: A successful and popular nightclub owner who believes financial independence is the path to equality and success, must act as a go-between for militant-minded brother and the white gang syndicate his brother has attacked and robbed. Their involvements lead to a breathless race course chase, the destruction of a dopepusher and a violent waterfront climax.

Title: The Outside Man
Overview: A French hit man is hired by a crime family to end the life of a rival mobster, but things fall apart when the boss who hired him is killed.

Title: Cries and Whispers
Tagline: A haunting and shattering film experience.
Overview: When a woman dying of cancer in turn-of-the century Sweden is visited by her two sisters, long repressed feelings between the siblings rise to the surface.

Title: The Border
Overview: A corrupted border agent decides to clean up his act when an impoverished woman's baby is put up for sale on the black market.

Title: All the Way Boys
Overview: The "Trinity" crew makes another modern era film. Plata and Salud are pilots ditching aircraft for insurance money. They wind up crashing for real in the jungles of South America. The plot involves "Mr. Big", who is buying the diamonds from the miners for much too little, and has thugs who keep the price down. Of course, Plata and Salud side with the miners

Title: Ludwig
Overview: A history of Ludwig, king of Bavaria, from his crowning in 1864 until his death in 1886.

Title: Tom Sawyer
Overview: Tom Sawyer and his pal Huckleberry Finn have great adventures on the Mississippi River, pretending to be pirates, attending their own funeral, and witnessing a murder.

Title: Rugantino
Overview: A beautiful girl Rosina lives In Rome. Her husband is strong as a bull and jealous as Shakespeare's Othello. Once the husband of Rosina kills a wealthy aristocrat, who sang the serenade to his wife, and now he is hiding from justice.

Title: The No Mercy Man
Tagline: You Damn Well Won't Forget Him!
Overview: A decorated Vietnam Vet returns to his father's ranch in Arizona just as criminally minded carnies begin to cause trouble.

Title: Columbo - Ransom for a Dead Man
Overview: A brilliant tort attorney gets rid of her boring husband by faking his kidnapping and keeping the ransom. The FBI may be fooled, but not Columbo.
Original Title: Columbo - Ransom for a Dead Man

Title: Three Giant Men
Overview: Istanbul is being terrorized by a crime wave, and the police call in American superhero Captain America and Mexican wrestler Santo to put a stop to it.

Title: Adventures of Mowgli
Overview: Adventures of Mowgli is an animated feature-length story originally released as five animated shorts of about 20 minutes each between 1967 and 1971 in the Soviet Union.

Title: No One Heard the Scream
Overview: A woman sees a man throw a person into an elevator shaft and helps him to get rid of the body. During this adventure the man falls in love with the witness to his crime.

Title: The Last American Hero
Overview: A backwoods bootlegger decides to put the driving skills he developed evading the law to good use. He becomes a race car driver, and eventually, one of the fastest drivers in history.

Title: Belladonna of Sadness
Overview: A peasant woman is banished from her village and makes a deal with the devil to gain magical powers.

Title: A Name for Evil
Tagline: The dream house that becomes a nightmare.
Overview: Dissatisfied with the family architectural business, a man and his wife pack up and move out to his great-grandfather's old house in the country. While trying to patch it up, the house starts to make it clear to him that it doesn't want him there, but the local church (with some off-kilter practices of their own) seems to take a shine to him.

Title: The Seven-Ups
Tagline: Mess with the Seven-Ups, and they WILL mess you worse.
Overview: A tough detective who is part of an elite New York City unit is trying to find out who killed his partner, but uncovers a plot to kidnap mobsters for money.

Title: Love Me Deadly
Tagline: A Hunger from Beyond the Grave!
Overview: A coven of devil-worshipping necrophiliacs moves to Los Angeles and sets up their base of operations out of a funeral home.

Title: Ambush
Overview: An officer of the law and his father are framed for a robbery they did not commit. With only his father's sword at the scene and the man nowhere to be found the officer flees in order to discover who really stole the jewels so that he may clear the family name.

Title: The Yakuza Papers, Vol. 1: Battles Without Honor and Humanity
Overview: In the teeming black markets of postwar Japan, Shozo Hirono and his buddies find themselves in a new war between factious and ambitious yakuza...

Title: The Night Strangler
Overview: After being run out of Las Vegas, Kolchak heads for Seattle and another reporting job with the local paper. It's not long before he is on the trail of another string of bizarre murders. It seems that every 21 years, for the past century, a killer kills a certain number of people, drains them of their blood and then disappears into the night. Kolchak is on his trail, but can he stop him?

Title: Baffled!
Overview: Race car driver suffers from visions where he sees people killed. An ESP expert believes that his visions will really happen.

Title: Steelyard Blues
Tagline: If you can't beat 'em ... drive 'em crazy!
Overview: A group of misfits decide to leave for a place that they can all be free. There mode of transportation is a PBY flying boat. The only problem is that the PBY needs a lot of work and they will need jobs to pay for the parts. When they find that they have only 10 days before the PBY is sold for scrap, they decide on borrowing the parts for their trip

Title: The Boss
Overview: A bomb attack in a cinema in Palermo kills all the fellows of Attardi's clan a part from Cocchi. He immediately understands that the author of the bomb attack is Daniello from Don Corrasco's clan. Cocchi is determined to revenge. His actions, including the Corrasco's daughter kidnap, in a Palermo in which also the police is corrupted, will soon destroy the old equilibrium giving the way to an escalation of violence that won't save anyone. If Cocchi will survive to the mafia war he will be the new boss for sure.

Title: Black Caesar
Tagline: Hail Caesar Godfather of Harlem!
Overview: Tommy Gibbs is a tough kid, raised in the ghetto, who aspires to be a kingpin criminal. As a young boy, his leg is broken by a bad cop on the take, during a payoff gone bad. Nursing his vengeance, he rises to power in Harlem, New York. Angry at the racist society around him, both criminal and straight, he sees the acquisition of power as the solution to his rage.

Title: A Reflection of Fear
Tagline: A cry in the night... A gasp in the dark...
Overview: A young girl lives with her mother and grandmother. One day her estranged father returns home with a female companion he introduces as his fiance. Soon the girl finds herself in the midst of strange goings-on, which evolve into a web of crime and murder.

Title: Gang War in Milan
Overview: A Milan pimp faces off against a ruthless and greedy French gangster whom wants to unite organized crime in Italy.

Title: Walking Tall
Tagline: Take your best shot... 'cause it'll probably be your last.
Overview: Buford Pusser's a wrestler, whose wife wants him to settle down, so they go to his home town in Tennessee, where he plans to get into business with his father. But he is shocked to discover all sorts of graft and corruption going on. And when he is a victim of it and decides to strike back by running against the corrupt sheriff. And he wins and wages his own little war against them

Title: One Man's War
Overview: Man leaves his factory job and sells everything to buy an earth mover and start his own business, travelling from place to place with his wife and child. There is not enough work and he is eventually forced to emigrate after many hardships.

Title: Children Shouldn't Play with Dead Things
Tagline: You're Invited To Orville's "Coming-Out" Party...It'll Be A Scream...YOURS!!!
Overview: Six actors go to graveyard on a remote island to act out a necromantic ritual. The ritual works, and soon the dead are walking about and chowing down on human flesh.
Original Title: Children Shouldn't Play with Dead Things

Title: The Cheerleaders
Tagline: Come and huddle with the cheerleaders.
Overview: A group of cheerleaders from the local high school decide to show their school spirit for their football team by sleeping with the opponents the night before the game so that they can be so worn out the opposition won't be able to play.

Title: Themroc
Overview: Made without proper language, just gibberish and grunts, "Themroc" is an absurdist comedy about a man who rejects every facet of normal bourgeois life and turns his apartment into a virtual cave.

Title: Don Quijote cabalga de nuevo
Overview: A new vision of the Knight of the sad figure, which lives obsessed by the chivalry and its codes of honor. Accompanied by his unusual squire Sancho Panza, Don Quixote recalls some of the adventures they've shared.

Title: Godspell: A Musical Based on the Gospel According to St. Matthew
Tagline: The Gospel according to today.
Overview: A modern day musical telling of the ministry of Jesus Christ set in New York. The Apostles, portrayed as an acting troupe re-enact the parables and teachings of Jesus.
Original Title: Godspell: A Musical Based on the Gospel According to St. Matthew

Title: Sisters
Tagline: They were joined at birth by the devil and the evil never left them!
Overview: A journalist witnesses a brutal murder in a neighboring apartment, but the police do not believe that the crime took place. With the help of a private detective, she seeks out the truth.

Title: Malicious
Overview: A beautiful housekeeper becomes a romantic attraction to a widower and his three sons.

Title: The Son
Overview: Ange leaves New York to fly to his native Corsica. His mother is dying and Ange, who was not present when his father died, wishes to be present at her death. In Corsica Ange finds his brother Baptiste who married Maria, the woman he loved. He finds out that his father was killed, but nobody wants to tell him the name of the killer. And finally he finds two killers expecting him.

Title: Cannibal Girls
Tagline: These Girls Eat Men
Overview: A young couple spend the night in a restaurant, only to find out that it is haunted by three dead women who hunger for human flesh.

Title: The Iron Rose
Tagline: A strange love story.
Overview: A young couple out for a walk decide to take a stroll through a large cemetery. As darkness begins to fall they realize they can't find their way out, and soon their fears begin to overtake them.

Title: Charley-One-Eye
Tagline: Somebody told the black man he wasn't a slave anymore. Somebody told the red man this land was his. Somebody lied. Somebody is going to pay.
Overview: A black, Union Army deserter and his crippled American Indian hostage form a strained partnership in the interests of surviving the advancing threats of a racist bounty hunter and neighboring bandits.

Title: Hitler: The Last Ten Days
Overview: Hitler: The Last Ten Days takes us into the depths of der Furher’s Berlin bunker during his final days. Based on the book by Gerhard Boldt, it provides a bleak look at the goings-on within, and without.

Title: Soylent Green
Tagline: What is the secret of Soylent Green?
Overview: In an overpopulated futuristic Earth, a New York police detective finds himself marked for murder by government agents when he gets too close to a bizarre state secret involving the origins of a revolutionary and needed new foodstuff.

Title: The Heroine
Overview: Incriminating evidence against a gang is left in a cab when a gang member dies in it. The gang chases the innocent cab driver, who receives help from the dead gangster's sister - a tough police woman.

Title: Lemora: A Child's Tale of the Supernatural
Overview: A notorious bank robber kills his wife and flees the police, only to be captured by a mysterious group of figures in an abandoned town. His beautiful daughter, Lila Lee, receives a letter stating that her father is near death and that he needs to see her. Sneaking away at night from her minister guardian, Lila embarks on a terrifying journey...
Original Title: Lemora: A Child's Tale of the Supernatural

Title: In the West There Was a Man Named Invincible
Original Title: Lo chiamavano Tresette... giocava sempre col morto

Title: Through and Through
Overview: Based on a pre-war murder case of the Malisz couple. They end up committing a petty robbery and a sordid murder. He is an illustrator who is not used by a climbing architect. His folks don't like his wife and keeping both of them around as they float from one petty job to another.
